moteaccess
Class AbstractMoteAccess

java.lang.Object
  moteaccess.AbstractMoteAccess
Direct Known Subclasses:
MoteAccess
public abstract class AbstractMoteAccess
extends java.lang.Object

Generic base class for assigning mote usage privileges. This is an abstract class with the generic code to assign mote usage privileges. To integrate any custom reservation system, this class must be inherited and the abstract methods implemented.

getMoteControlPrivileges

public boolean[] getMoteControlPrivileges(long[] mote_ids,
                                          java.lang.String session_id)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Acquire mote control privileges using specific session.

Parameters:
mote_ids - IDs of mote to control.
session_id - ID of session that wants privileges.
Returns:
A boolean array with entries for each requested mote.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

                                          java.lang.String session_id)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Acquire control privilege for one mote.

Parameters:
mote_id - ID of mote to control.
session_id - ID of session that wants control privilege.
Returns:
True if mote control privilege was granted.

java.lang.Exception

checkMoteAccess

protected boolean checkMoteAccess(java.lang.String session_id,
                                  java.lang.String priv_id,
                                  long mote_id)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Check for mote access. Check if mote can be accessed by the given session, either because no session or the given session is (already) using the mote, or the give session has an active reservation.

Parameters:
session_id - ID of session that wants access.
priv_id - ID of currently privileged session; null if none.
mote_id - ID of mote for which access is wanted.
Returns:
True if mote access can be acquired.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

hasReservation

protected abstract boolean hasReservation(long mote_id,
                                          java.lang.String session_id)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Check if session can reserve a given mote. This method must be implemented to integrate a custom reservation system. It is also a point for integration between user account system and reservation system. Note that the user model should specify the relevant reservation key upon session authentication. The details of how to do this are application specific.

Parameters:
mote_id - Database key for the mote to check
session_id - Database key for the session requesting access.
Returns:
True if there is a current reservation, false otherwise
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
